task.title: Making coffee
task.shortdesc: Something to do so you are more awake.

taskbody.context: You'll need a coffee maker, coffee grounds, water, cream, sugar and a mug.

step.cmd: Fill your coffee maker with the desired amount of water.
Fill your coffee maker with the correct amount of coffee grounds for the amount of water you used.
Press 'Start' or 'Brew Now' on your coffee maker.
Wait for your coffee to brew.
When finished, pour your coffee from the coffee maker to your mug.
Add cream or sugar if desired and enjoy.
